dcterms:creator: V. Zayats
M. Ostendorf
H. Hajishirzi
dcterms:description: The SCOTUS corpus consists of seven oral arguments between justices and advocates, with nested disfluency tags flattened and hand-annotated.
dcterms:title: SCOTUS

dcterms:creator: Linguistic Data Consortium
dcterms:description: The CallHome corpus is a collection of telephone calls where each participant was asked to call a person of their choice, with nested disfluency tags flattened and hand-annotated.
dcterms:title: CallHome

dcterms:creator: I. McCowan
J. Carletta
W. Kraaij
S. Ashby
S. Bourban
M. Flynn
M. Guillemot
T. Hain
J. Kadlec
V. Karaiskos
dcterms:description: The AMI Meeting Corpus contains recordings of multiple-speaker meetings on a wide range of subjects, with various types of crowd-sourced annotations including speech disfluencies.
dcterms:title: AMI Meeting Corpus (AMI)

dcterms:creator: A. Janin
D. Baron
J. Edwards
D. Ellis
D. Gelbart
N. Morgan
B. Peskin
T. Pfau
E. Shriberg
A. Stolcke
C. Wooters
dcterms:description: The ICSI Meeting Corpus is a collection of multi-person meeting recordings, providing the highest count of disfluency-annotated transcripts among the datasets used.
dcterms:title: ICSI Meeting Corpus (ICSI)

dcterms:creator: J.-U. Bang
S. Yun
S.-H. Kim

M.-K. Lee
Y.-J. Kim
D.-H. Kim

Y.-J. Lee
S.-H. Kim
dcterms:description: KsponSpeech is a collection of spontaneous Korean speech recordings, each labeled with disfluencies and mispronunciations.
dcterms:title: KsponSpeech (Kspon)
